column4: [ if exist "file.dat" rm file.dat ] what am i doing wrong? sh script

There are a lot of ways.  Best to ask in #irssi
You shouldn't be modyifying your irssi config manually. #irssi can tell you the right way to change that setting.

What exactly are you trying to accomplish?

Well, if I'm not mistaken, one of the steps that the Ubuntu upgrade tools do is first install ubuntu-minimal if it is not installed, as its a good place to start for determining what dependencies need to be upgraded/installed.
